programme.title: Avida
Avida
programme.desc:
Avida: Directed by Benoît Delépine, Gustave Kervern. With Anselme, Fernando Arrabal, Anne Benett, Beu. The kidnapping of a plump billionaire's dog by a deaf-mute and 2 ketamine addicts goes wrong. The wealthy woman takes advantage of the situation to make them fullfil her last wishes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0478558/","name":"Avida","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjhhMGYwNGMtOWUxYS00NDZlLWFhNmItZjcwZTUxZjE3OTE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzk5OTU5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The kidnapping of a plump billionaire's dog by a deaf-mute and 2 ketamine addicts goes wrong. The wealthy woman takes advantage of the situation to make them fullfil her last wishes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0478558/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JFriday"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"It'll keep you guessing - why you wasted your time.","reviewBody":"Nothing at all like what the synopsis at the film festival led me to expect. This is the only movie that I have ever walked out on in my life. And I did that with only 15 minutes left in the show.

A clever ad agency might write a tagline such as "It'll keep you guessing!" What they really mean is that you will never know what the hell it's about. There was a vague pretext that seemed to offer a hint of progression and kept you thinking that it would all make sense in the end. When I realized that there was no way they could cobble together a storyline in the final 15 minutes, I decided that their time was up.

Essentially, it was a macabre sequence of situations that mostly gave the viewer a repulsive look at the actions and reactions of unsupervised people with mild to strong mental handicaps. It relied on using midgets, obese people and various unpleasant stereotypes to present a very non politically correct image. While I don't oppose challenging the PC crowd, it ought to at least be done with a message. In this case, the message appears to be "french people are messed up"."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":634,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-13","keywords":"surrealism,overweight woman,experimental film,dwarf,character name as title","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285397/","name":"Anselme"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0037130/","name":"Fernando Arrabal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285208/","name":"Anne Benett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0218022/","name":"Benoît Delépine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1086956/","name":"Gustave Kervern"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086918/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0218022/","name":"Benoît Delépine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1086956/","name":"Gustave Kervern"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Six Minutes to Midnight: Directed by Andy Goddard. With Nigel Lindsay, Judi Dench, Eddie Izzard, Jim Broadbent. UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5114840/","name":"Six Minutes to Midnight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGY1YWI4NzEtNmYyMS00NWFjLTk3YTgtNTkzNWFkZDlmNmZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5114840/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"merridew-2"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Do We Really Care?","reviewBody":"Reportedly, Eddie Izzard, whose family is from Bexhill, knew the story of the real Augusta Victoria school and wanted to turn it into a WWII drama. But what is there really to this story: (a) there is a British school for the daughters of high-ranking German Nazis (inexplicably being educated in England) whom (b) the Germans want brought back to Germany before the war begins but (c) the British want detained in England (but would commit a diplomatic faux pas if they detained them prematurely). But does anyone truly care if these girls stay or go? All of the intrigue and thriller elements (some of which are reasonably well executed) are laid on top of what, at its core, is a seemingly inconsequential premise. Whether it's true or not, it's uninteresting. The twists and effective moments should have been saved for a film where the stakes were something we cared about.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-15","keywords":"world war two","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4131766553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"In the summer of 1939, school teacher Thomas Miller (Eddie Izzard) takes a last minute role teaching English at the Augusta-Victoria College, Bexhill-on-Sea, a finishing school on the south coast of England. Despite the political storm clouds forming across Europe, daughters of influential families in Nazi Germany learn deportment, Shakespeare and how to be faithful members of Hitler’s League of German Girls."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0512283/","name":"Nigel Lindsay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484683/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0468830/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0857703/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427714/","name":"Celyn Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Profession : danseur.euse
programme.desc: Marion Motin, Germain Louvet, Léo Walk, Lasseindra Ninja, Ludmila Pagliero et Mehdi Kerkouche prennent le temps de raconter leur métier, qui est également une passion. Quels sont leurs modèles ? Que cherchent-ils à atteindre ? Comment vivent-ils leurs émotions sur scène ? Quel rapport entretiennent-ils avec leur corps ? Tous vont échanger sur leur passion et partager leurs points de vue. Danseur étoile, chorégraphe de danse contemporaine ou s'illustrant dans le hip hop ou le voguing, ils s'illustrent dans des styles différents mais partagent un même amour pour leur art.
programme.category: Magazine de société

programme.title: Kem's
programme.desc: Sous ses ordres, deux équipes de deux personnalités s'affrontent pour devenir les maîtres du Kem's. Le but : échanger des cartes afin de réunir quatre cartes identiques et le faire savoir à son coéquipier par un signe particulier. Évidemment, il ne faut pas se faire griller sous peine de se faire contre-kemser ! Entre cartes loufoques, signes étonnants et mauvais perdants de légende, vous irez tous vous faire Kem's avec Ramzy ! "Avec la participation de Redouane Bougheraba, Amel Chabi, Franck Dubosc, Thomas Dutronc, Gad Elmaleh, Laura Felpin, Maxime Gasteuil, JoeyStarr, Matthieu Longatte, Michou, Félix Moati, Natoo, Jérôme Niel, Elie Semoun, Claudia Tagbo, Jean-Pascal Zadi...

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Six Minutes to Midnight: Directed by Andy Goddard. With Nigel Lindsay, Judi Dench, Eddie Izzard, Jim Broadbent. UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5114840/","name":"Six Minutes to Midnight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGY1YWI4NzEtNmYyMS00NWFjLTk3YTgtNTkzNWFkZDlmNmZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5114840/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"merridew-2"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Do We Really Care?","reviewBody":"Reportedly, Eddie Izzard, whose family is from Bexhill, knew the story of the real Augusta Victoria school and wanted to turn it into a WWII drama. But what is there really to this story: (a) there is a British school for the daughters of high-ranking German Nazis (inexplicably being educated in England) whom (b) the Germans want brought back to Germany before the war begins but (c) the British want detained in England (but would commit a diplomatic faux pas if they detained them prematurely). But does anyone truly care if these girls stay or go? All of the intrigue and thriller elements (some of which are reasonably well executed) are laid on top of what, at its core, is a seemingly inconsequential premise. Whether it's true or not, it's uninteresting. The twists and effective moments should have been saved for a film where the stakes were something we cared about.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-15","keywords":"world war two","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4131766553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"In the summer of 1939, school teacher Thomas Miller (Eddie Izzard) takes a last minute role teaching English at the Augusta-Victoria College, Bexhill-on-Sea, a finishing school on the south coast of England. Despite the political storm clouds forming across Europe, daughters of influential families in Nazi Germany learn deportment, Shakespeare and how to be faithful members of Hitler’s League of German Girls."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0512283/","name":"Nigel Lindsay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484683/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0468830/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0857703/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427714/","name":"Celyn Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shadowplay
Shadowplay
programme.desc:
Shadowplay: With Taylor Kitsch, Michael C. Hall, Logan Marshall-Green, Nina Hoss. Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8879894/","name":"Shadowplay","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M1YzFiYzAtNGUwYS00MmE1LTg2ZTEtM2FkYjg1NTgxMjgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzg5MzIyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8879894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"yooniverse"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A decent show despite shortcomings","reviewBody":"First of all, "Shadowplay" is a dumb name for this show. "The Defeated", the show's original title, might have been better. But neither really captures the show that well. Set in post-war Germany shortly after their defeat, the show's early episodes seem to do a decent job of capturing the misery, desperation, and the broken remains of a country and its people who not only lost the war, but had their civilization bombed into submission.

And perhaps that's why a story of a NYPD cop trying to help rebuild and reestablish law and order sounded like a good premise. But that epic-worthy premise gets weighed down by a search for a brother who's gone AWOL, run-ins with Russian military (which is okay if they weren't made into villains), and multitudes of minor story branches that just seem to drag the story into smaller issues that muddle the show and makes the story feel small. What gets lost is the bigger picture, of what is transpiring at the historical level during this time period. This is no Babylon Berlin, which in my opinion, is a masterpiece.

And what's up with the Brooklyn accent? Kitsch does a passable job, but the show can't seem to make up its mind on whether he's a scrappy street cop or a polished NY police brass savvy in the ways of bureaucracy and politics. I suppose it's part of his backstory, but to me, it feels unnecessary, just like all the f-bombs casually thrown in.

Despite all its shortcomings, the show is beautifully shot, the acting is mostly good (mostly the Germans), and there is a main story that makes its way through, I think. It's not entirely a waste of time to watch--if you have the time, that is.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2295,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-30","keywords":"police protagonist,american cop abroad,american in germany,post war germany,world war two","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2018237/","name":"Taylor Kitsch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334869/","name":"Logan Marshall-Green"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0352167/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078814/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shadowplay: Die Komplette 1 Staffel (German)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi500744473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FjMTMyOWQtM2EyOS00YjZjLTk5MDctM2ZmZjExOGFkYjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FjMTMyOWQtM2EyOS00YjZjLTk5MDctM2ZmZjExOGFkYjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shadowplay: Die Komplette 1 Staffel (German)"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shadowplay
Shadowplay
programme.desc:
Shadowplay: With Taylor Kitsch, Michael C. Hall, Logan Marshall-Green, Nina Hoss. Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8879894/","name":"Shadowplay","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M1YzFiYzAtNGUwYS00MmE1LTg2ZTEtM2FkYjg1NTgxMjgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzg5MzIyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8879894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"yooniverse"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A decent show despite shortcomings","reviewBody":"First of all, "Shadowplay" is a dumb name for this show. "The Defeated", the show's original title, might have been better. But neither really captures the show that well. Set in post-war Germany shortly after their defeat, the show's early episodes seem to do a decent job of capturing the misery, desperation, and the broken remains of a country and its people who not only lost the war, but had their civilization bombed into submission.

And perhaps that's why a story of a NYPD cop trying to help rebuild and reestablish law and order sounded like a good premise. But that epic-worthy premise gets weighed down by a search for a brother who's gone AWOL, run-ins with Russian military (which is okay if they weren't made into villains), and multitudes of minor story branches that just seem to drag the story into smaller issues that muddle the show and makes the story feel small. What gets lost is the bigger picture, of what is transpiring at the historical level during this time period. This is no Babylon Berlin, which in my opinion, is a masterpiece.

And what's up with the Brooklyn accent? Kitsch does a passable job, but the show can't seem to make up its mind on whether he's a scrappy street cop or a polished NY police brass savvy in the ways of bureaucracy and politics. I suppose it's part of his backstory, but to me, it feels unnecessary, just like all the f-bombs casually thrown in.

Despite all its shortcomings, the show is beautifully shot, the acting is mostly good (mostly the Germans), and there is a main story that makes its way through, I think. It's not entirely a waste of time to watch--if you have the time, that is.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2295,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-30","keywords":"police protagonist,american cop abroad,american in germany,post war germany,world war two","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2018237/","name":"Taylor Kitsch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334869/","name":"Logan Marshall-Green"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0352167/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078814/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shadowplay: Die Komplette 1 Staffel (German)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi500744473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FjMTMyOWQtM2EyOS00YjZjLTk5MDctM2ZmZjExOGFkYjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FjMTMyOWQtM2EyOS00YjZjLTk5MDctM2ZmZjExOGFkYjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shadowplay: Die Komplette 1 Staffel (German)"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Été 85
Été 85
programme.desc: Été 85: Directed by François Ozon. With Félix Lefebvre, Benjamin Voisin, Philippine Velge, Valeria Bruni Tedeschi. While boating, Alexis's boat capsizes and almost drowns before being rescued by David, who ultimately ends up as his boyfriend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10457128/","name":"Été 85","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZhMTQxZDUtMDJiYi00NWUyLTkwNmYtZjkzZDUxNzEwZjIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDU0NjMyNTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"While boating, Alexis's boat capsizes and almost drowns before being rescued by David, who ultimately ends up as his boyfriend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10457128/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"schorschi100"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A teen love story with too much drama but not enough development","reviewBody":"I decided to watch the movie with mixed feelings. The plot seemed not intriguing enough, but Ozon's name is (or at least was) a certain guarantee. Alas, the disappointment prevailed. In 8 femmes, Ozon managed to keep an unforgiving and at the same time uncommenting eye into the human behavior. The behavior itself developed the characters, and brought them together into a whole. Eté 85 is a mixture of Ozon and a try to mimic Almadóvar's way of looking into tragedy, which unfortunately fails completely. The scenes are great, the actors true to their characters, but what comes out is a story swaying between a kitsch gay teenagers' love affair and a family drama. The ending is weird (I am referring to the court sentence), taking into account the fact that the subject of homosexuality was at the time socially unacceptable was extremely poorly part of the story to that point, with the exception of a vague reference to an uncle). None of the three main characters (Alexis, David and the mother, Mme Gorman) develop and their reactions throughout the film are irrational, somewhere between funny and stupid, in a combination which simply does not work. Kate's acting is miserable, same as Alexis' parents. The only convincing character, if any, is probably the social worker.\n\nConcluding, this is a mediocre film to watch if you are into gay dramas and have nothing better to do. Matches up the standards of east asian gay drama series, but not the ones of main stream cinematography, and is definitely not Ozon's most brilliant accomplishment.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6454,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2020-07-14","keywords":"gay,male nudity,male rear nudity,gay kiss,boy dressed as girl","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3960782361","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzlkN2RlN2EtMDZmOS00ODE5LWIxODAtMDc2NjYxMTZiZjg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzlkN2RlN2EtMDZmOS00ODE5LWIxODAtMDc2NjYxMTZiZjg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"What do you dream of when you're 16 years old and in a seaside resort in Normandy in the 1980s? A best friend? A lifelong teen pact? Scooting off on adventures on a boat or a motorbike? Living life at breakneck speed? No. You dream of death. Because you can't get a bigger kick than dying. And that's why you save it till the very end. The summer holidays are just beginning, and this story recounts how Alexis grew into himself."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9156565/","name":"Félix Lefebvre"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8308968/","name":"Benjamin Voisin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10810831/","name":"Philippine Velge"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654830/","name":"François Ozon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032439/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102303/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1525791/","name":"Aidan Chambers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654830/","name":"François Ozon"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

"The Defeated", the show's original title, might have been better. But neither really captures the show that well. Set in post-war Germany shortly after their defeat, the show's early episodes seem to do a decent job of capturing the misery, desperation, and the broken remains of a country and its people who not only lost the war, but had their civilization bombed into submission.

And perhaps that's why a story of a NYPD cop trying to help rebuild and reestablish law and order sounded like a good premise. But that epic-worthy premise gets weighed down by a search for a brother who's gone AWOL, run-ins with Russian military (which is okay if they weren't made into villains), and multitudes of minor story branches that just seem to drag the story into smaller issues that muddle the show and makes the story feel small. What gets lost is the bigger picture, of what is transpiring at the historical level during this time period. This is no Babylon Berlin, which in my opinion, is a masterpiece.

And what's up with the Brooklyn accent? Kitsch does a passable job, but the show can't seem to make up its mind on whether he's a scrappy street cop or a polished NY police brass savvy in the ways of bureaucracy and politics. I suppose it's part of his backstory, but to me, it feels unnecessary, just like all the f-bombs casually thrown in.

Despite all its shortcomings, the show is beautifully shot, the acting is mostly good (mostly the Germans), and there is a main story that makes its way through, I think. It's not entirely a waste of time to watch--if you have the time, that is.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2295,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-30","keywords":"police protagonist,american cop abroad,american in germany,post war germany,world war two","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2018237/","name":"Taylor Kitsch","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334869/","name":"Logan Marshall-Green"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0352167/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078814/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shadowplay: Die Komplette 1 Staffel (German)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi500744473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FjMTMyOWQtM2EyOS00YjZjLTk5MDctM2ZmZjExOGFkYjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FjMTMyOWQtM2EyOS00YjZjLTk5MDctM2ZmZjExOGFkYjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shadowplay: Die Komplette 1 Staffel (German)"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kem's
programme.desc: Sous ses ordres, deux équipes de deux personnalités s'affrontent pour devenir les maîtres du Kem's. Le but : échanger des cartes afin de réunir quatre cartes identiques et le faire savoir à son coéquipier par un signe particulier. Évidemment, il ne faut pas se faire griller sous peine de se faire contre-kemser ! Entre cartes loufoques, signes étonnants et mauvais perdants de légende, vous irez tous vous faire Kem's avec Ramzy ! "Avec la participation de Redouane Bougheraba, Amel Chabi, Franck Dubosc, Thomas Dutronc, Gad Elmaleh, Laura Felpin, Maxime Gasteuil, JoeyStarr, Matthieu Longatte, Michou, Félix Moati, Natoo, Jérôme Niel, Elie Semoun, Claudia Tagbo, Jean-Pascal Zadi...

programme.title: Sputnik
Sputnik : espèce inconnue
programme.desc:
Sputnik: Directed by Egor Abramenko. With Oksana Akinshina, Fedor Bondarchuk, Pyotr Fyodorov, Anton Vasilev. The lone survivor of an enigmatic spaceship incident hasn't returned home alone - hiding inside his body is a dangerous creature." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11905962/","name":"Sputnik","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTI4ZmE4MDUtMTFjOS00NWNkLThkMzgtOTdmYzY4ODhmYTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"The lone survivor of an enigmatic spaceship incident hasn't returned home alone - hiding inside his body is a dangerous creature.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11905962/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"siderite"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very good slow burn Russian scifi","reviewBody":"I am happy to see that Russian scifi films are finally moving towards the Russian scifi literature that I loved so much as a child. This is a wonderful little gem, a Russian version of Life, but with more focus on the people and less on the special effects and action scenes. Not perfect, mind you, but so far the best Russian science fiction film I've seen them make recently. And the special effects were very good, too, which makes the decision to keep them in the background so much more laudable.

The weakest link is the main character, unfortunately, who does things that make little sense for a scientist. Yet her contribution is not that of a character, but as a carrier of the audience, so what she does is really not that relevant.

I hope Russian cinema will start bringing back the intellectual slow burn story, the civilian scientists that have to solve problems without relying on strength or weapons, but on their own thinking.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2020-07-24","keywords":"spaceship,female protagonist,monster,creature,scientist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sputnik","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3659907353","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODhhOTkzNzItMWNiZS00YjZiLTg2MjMtNGFiOThjOGY1NmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODhhOTkzNzItMWNiZS00YjZiLTg2MjMtNGFiOThjOGY1NmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0968541/","name":"Oksana Akinshina"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0094080/","name":"Fedor Bondarchuk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1215228/","name":"Pyotr Fyodorov"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3325960/","name":"Egor Abramenko"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0194828/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0522436/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0538029/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2672655/","name":"Oleg Malovichko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2454599/","name":"Andrey Zolotarev"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8879894/","name":"Shadowplay","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M1YzFiYzAtNGUwYS00MmE1LTg2ZTEtM2FkYjg1NTgxMjgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzg5MzIyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8879894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"yooniverse"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A decent show despite shortcomings","reviewBody":"First of all, "Shadowplay" is a dumb name for this show. "The Defeated", the show's original title, might have been better. But neither really captures the show that well. Set in post-war Germany shortly after their defeat, the show's early episodes seem to do a decent job of capturing the misery, desperation, and the broken remains of a country and its people who not only lost the war, but had their civilization bombed into submission.

And perhaps that's why a story of a NYPD cop trying to help rebuild and reestablish law and order sounded like a good premise. But that epic-worthy premise gets weighed down by a search for a brother who's gone AWOL, run-ins with Russian military (which is okay if they weren't made into villains), and multitudes of minor story branches that just seem to drag the story into smaller issues that muddle the show and makes the story feel small. What gets lost is the bigger picture, of what is transpiring at the historical level during this time period. This is no Babylon Berlin, which in my opinion, is a masterpiece.

And what's up with the Brooklyn accent? Kitsch does a passable job, but the show can't seem to make up its mind on whether he's a scrappy street cop or a polished NY police brass savvy in the ways of bureaucracy and politics. I suppose it's part of his backstory, but to me, it feels unnecessary, just like all the f-bombs casually thrown in.

Despite all its shortcomings, the show is beautifully shot, the acting is mostly good (mostly the Germans), and there is a main story that makes its way through, I think. It's not entirely a waste of time to watch--if you have the time, that is.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2295,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-30","keywords":"police protagonist,american cop abroad,american in germany,post war germany,world war two","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2018237/","name":"Taylor Kitsch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. "The Defeated", the show's original title, might have been better. But neither really captures the show that well. Set in post-war Germany shortly after their defeat, the show's early episodes seem to do a decent job of capturing the misery, desperation, and the broken remains of a country and its people who not only lost the war, but had their civilization bombed into submission.

And perhaps that's why a story of a NYPD cop trying to help rebuild and reestablish law and order sounded like a good premise. But that epic-worthy premise gets weighed down by a search for a brother who's gone AWOL, run-ins with Russian military (which is okay if they weren't made into villains), and multitudes of minor story branches that just seem to drag the story into smaller issues that muddle the show and makes the story feel small. What gets lost is the bigger picture, of what is transpiring at the historical level during this time period. This is no Babylon Berlin, which in my opinion, is a masterpiece.

And what's up with the Brooklyn accent? Kitsch does a passable job, but the show can't seem to make up its mind on whether he's a scrappy street cop or a polished NY police brass savvy in the ways of bureaucracy and politics. I suppose it's part of his backstory, but to me, it feels unnecessary, just like all the f-bombs casually thrown in.

Despite all its shortcomings, the show is beautifully shot, the acting is mostly good (mostly the Germans), and there is a main story that makes its way through, I think. programme.title: Le ballon d'or
Le ballon d'or
programme.desc: Le ballon d'or: Directed by Cheik Doukouré. With Aboubacar Sidiki Sumah, Agnès Soral, Habib Hammoud, Mody Sory Barry. The story of Salif Keïta, first "Ballon d'or d'Afrique" (African Golden Ball)." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0109201/","name":"Le ballon d'or","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzMDc3MjAzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzM4MTkxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Salif Keïta, first "Ballon d'or d'Afrique" (African Golden Ball).","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0109201/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Fitzie22"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Twelve-year old African boy hopes to become new Roger Milla and starts his soccer odyssey, facing all kinds of problems on the way","reviewBody":"This is actually one of my favorite movies. It gives good insight in the daily problems that young Africans like Bandian face and the culture they grow up in. I myself think it's horrible to see that his parents, with the help of some medicine man, decide what Bandian should do and shouldn't do with his life. But it's also a film of joy and hope. Bandian meets new friends on the way and learns about trust and forgiveness. The film paints great pictures of the African landscape. By the way, if you're a soccer fan, you'll probably like the action scenes of Bandian performing magic on the ball. I'd give it a 8 out of 10 rating."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":272,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Comedy","Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"1994-04-13","keywords":"soccer","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0838514/","name":"Aboubacar Sidiki Sumah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0814718/","name":"Agnès Soral"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358829/","name":"Habib Hammoud"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0235370/","name":"Cheik Doukouré"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076241/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112542/","name":"Martin Brossollet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136024/","name":"David Carayan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0235370/","name":"Cheik Doukouré"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marc, 36 ans, est un pilote de ligne épanoui dans sa vie professionnelle. Pour autant, il n'a pas encore trouver l'âme sœur. Il décide donc de participer à une émission de de télé-réalité dans l'espoir de rencontrer celle avec qui il pourra fonder une famille. Durant plusieurs semaines, treize femmes célibataires issues de toute la France vont tenter de le séduire.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: L'élimination de la première candidate a profondément bouleversé Marc. Le jeune célibataire constate qu'il a peur de s'impliquer dans une relation sérieuse avec une femme. Il décide d'en parler avec son psychologue, le docteur Juiphe. Il décide ensuite de faire passer un test d'humour aux douze candidates. Il invitera à dîner celle qui saura le divertir.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marc accorde beaucoup d'importance à son physique et multiplie les séances de sport dans sa vie en compagnie de Tony, son coach personnel. Ce dernier sombre peu à peu dans la dépression depuis que sa femme a demandé le divorce. De leur côté, les onze candidates encore en lice participent à des olympiades aquatiques. La lauréate passera un après-midi en compagnie de Marc.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marc apprend que les candidates préparent un grand buffet de tartines beurrées à l'occasion de la fête de la "Jean-Guile". Le célibataire semble être le seul à ne pas connaître cette fête traditionnelle célébrée chaque année. De leur côté, les jeunes femmes décident de se déguiser pour l'occasion. Contre toute attente, Sarah ressent les premiers signes de l'accouchement. La production de l'émission l'emmène en urgence à l'hôpital.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Après avoir accouché, Sarah a décidé de quitter le jeu. La naissance de cet enfant a profondément bouleversé Marc qui éprouve des envies de paternité. Il se confie à son psychologue, le docteur Juiphe. Pour évaluer le degré de générosité des candidates encore en lice, Marc convie les jeunes femmes a construire des abris pour une association qui s'occupe des sans domiciles fixe. Manon qui a connu pareille expérience retrouve un de ses amis.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: La production annonce à Marc que Chataléré va fêter son anniversaire. Le jeune pilote décide d'organiser une sortie en tête-à-tête avec elle au grand dam d'Alexandra et des autres candidates. Marc emmène son invitée à l'écurie des Roseaux afin de faire du cheval. Contre toute attente, Chataléré tombe sous le charme du palfregnier, un homme robuste et sympathique.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marina ne dissimule plus ses sentiments pour Soraya. Elle tente de lui ouvrir son coeur lors d'une séance de massage. Marc est de plus inquiet. Le jeune célibataire remarque que les candidates encore en lice ne se battent plus pour attirer son attention. En compagnie de Tony Tonic, son coach sportif, Marc organise une épreuve du parcours du combattant pour remotiver les filles.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Les candidates encore en course dans l'émission vont tenter de se qualifier pour les demi-finales du jeu. Le temps est venu pour Marc de rencontrer les familles des prétendantes. Il sympathise avec le père de Valérie qui lui promet de lui prêter son avion s'il choisit sa fille. De son côté, la mère de Marina ne se montre pas insensible aux charmes du célibataire.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marc a passé la nuit avec Anne afin de rendre Marina jalouse. Pour autant, cette dernière n'est pas tout attiré par le jeune homme et continue de lui cacher son attirance pour les femmes. Marc invite Marina a une dégustation de vins régionaux.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Leïla Bekhti
Camille Chamoux

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Le commandant Valérie Delbosse enquête seule sur un phénomène spatial troublant. Elle a rédigé un protocole de défense contre la menace ovni. De peur de ne pas être prise au sérieux, elle demande à Didier Mathure de le présenter aux plus aux sphères de l'état français. De leur côté, Véra et Rémy tente d'élucider le mystère du lac rempli de chaussures. Bernard annonce à Didier qu'Elise est la candidate du Cnes pour intégrer le pôle européen Ariane Espace.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Après l'explosion du satellite du Cnes chargé d'examiner les marées, le professeur Mathure décide de faire une déclaration à la télévision. De son côté, Elise oriente sa candidature sur un nouveau projet. Au Cnes, la direction est en émoi et cherche à comprendre les raisons qui ont provoqué la chute du satellite dans l'atmosphère. Rémy met tout en ouevre pour effacer son intervention sur l'ordinateur principal.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Possessions
Possessions
programme.desc: Possessions: Created by Shahar Magen. With Nadia Tereszkiewicz, Reda Kateb, Dominique Valadié, Ariane Ascaride. In Israel. The very evening of her wedding, Natalie, a young Frenchwoman, is accused of having killed her husband. programme.title: American Horror Story
American Horror Story
American Horror Story : Double Feature
programme.desc:
American Horror Story: Created by Brad Falchuk, Ryan Murphy. With Evan Peters, Sarah Paulson, Denis O'Hare, Kathy Bates. An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, and a slasher summer camp." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1844624/","name":"American Horror Story","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWFhOGI5ZmQtNjA1My00NWExLTg1MDktYThkYWI3ZTc4ZDYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, and a","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1844624/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Red_Identity"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent, entertaining, and very intriguing Horror show!","reviewBody":"Unlike many reviewers on here, I have waited until the end of the first season to actually review this series as a whole. I want to start off with the Pilot. When I first saw it, I had a lot of problems with it. It was messy, and some of the characters were dumb, and some of the acting was corny. However, after the Pilot ended, I realized just how intrigued I was by it. It sure was a messy Pilot, but that's the beauty of it. It was always moving, it wasn't your typical slow-paced suspense show. 

In fact, that pretty much sums up the whole season. This is a crackling, fast-paced and entertaining horror series. I would never call this high- art, but that's what makes it great. The show doesn't take itself seriously at all, and it always remains fun, even when it's silly, and yet you get really invested in the story lines and characters. Sure, the performances are flawed at times, and the writing and directing awkward, but the fast pace in every episode doesn't ever let the viewer gasp for air. This is the true definition of a thrill ride. It also feels very experimental. It executes a lot of things in very unordinary ways, in ways that no other TV show does. It doesn't always succeed, but even when it doesn't, you can appreciate it. 

Your friends might call The Walking Dead the better horror show, but I disagree. As far as Pilots go, no matter how entertaining or thrilling American Horror Story's Pilot was, the Pilot for The Walking Dead was better, masterful in every way. Since then, it's merely a good, sometimes great, TV show. It takes itself more seriously and is slower-paced, but it's problem is that a lot of times the writing just feels stale, recycled. You are intrigued by it, but it sometimes feels weaker than it should be. And the fact that it takes itself too seriously sort of dampens the fun one should be having with it, simply because its writing isn't strong enough to stretch out its story lines (like the two best TV shows on air, Mad Men and Breaking Bad, do). American Horror Story is better for these reasons- each episode by itself is exciting, it's always moving, and instead of trying to slow things down and makes its flaws more apparent, it even overdoes things on purpose. Messy, sure, silly, sometimes, but overall more intriguing, funner, and more exciting. I cannot wait for the second season of this, since I thought the resolution to the story of the first season was excellent, as well as the final shot. 

P.S. Oh, I also want to add another note to take. The performances do hit their great marks, but the only truly incredible performance is Jessica Lange. Her character and performance makes all other supporting turns in television look stale by comparison, and all of her scenes are truly gold! She needs to win that Emmy next year! I want to see her back!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":288753,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-10-05","keywords":"anthology,male objectification,infidelity,supernatural,serial murder","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3078932/","name":"Lady Gaga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000870/","name":"Kathy Bates"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000291/","name":"Angela Bassett"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060381/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314634/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0156994/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1004299/","name":"Brad Falchuk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Part 1: Red Tide - Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3243294745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBmNjJmM2EtMTA4NC00YTg2LWJkY2UtZmRkZDc4YTdmMTA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBmNjJmM2EtMTA4NC00YTg2LWJkY2UtZmRkZDc4YTdmMTA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Your first taste. Watch the OFFICIAL TRAILER for American Horror Story: DoubleFeature, Part 1 now. Premieres 8.25 FX, next day FX on Hulu."}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1844624, Title: American Horror Story, --- Description: American Horror Story: Created by Brad Falchuk, Ryan Murphy. With Evan Peters, Sarah Paulson, Denis O'Hare, Kathy Bates. An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, and a slasher summer camp." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1844624/","name":"American Horror Story","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWFhOGI5ZmQtNjA1My00NWExLTg1MDktYThkYWI3ZTc4ZDYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, and a","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1844624/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Red_Identity","dateCreated":"2011-12-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent, entertaining, and very intriguing Horror show!","reviewBody":"Unlike many reviewers on here, I have waited until the end of the first season to actually review this series as a whole. I want to start off with the Pilot. When I first saw it, I had a lot of problems with it. It was messy, and some of the characters were dumb, and some of the acting was corny. However, after the Pilot ended, I realized just how intrigued I was by it. It sure was a messy Pilot, but that's the beauty of it. It was always moving, it wasn't your typical slow-paced suspense show. 

In fact, that pretty much sums up the whole season. This is a crackling, fast-paced and entertaining horror series. I would never call this high- art, but that's what makes it great. The show doesn't take itself seriously at all, and it always remains fun, even when it's silly, and yet you get really invested in the story lines and characters. Sure, the performances are flawed at times, and the writing and directing awkward, but the fast pace in every episode doesn't ever let the viewer gasp for air. This is the true definition of a thrill ride. It also feels very experimental. It executes a lot of things in very unordinary ways, in ways that no other TV show does. It doesn't always succeed, but even when it doesn't, you can appreciate it. 

Your friends might call The Walking Dead the better horror show, but I disagree. As far as Pilots go, no matter how entertaining or thrilling American Horror Story's Pilot was, the Pilot for The Walking Dead was better, masterful in every way. Since then, it's merely a good, sometimes great, TV show. It takes itself more seriously and is slower-paced, but it's problem is that a lot of times the writing just feels stale, recycled. You are intrigued by it, but it sometimes feels weaker than it should be. And the fact that it takes itself too seriously sort of dampens the fun one should be having with it, simply because its writing isn't strong enough to stretch out its story lines (like the two best TV shows on air, Mad Men and Breaking Bad, do). American Horror Story is better for these reasons- each episode by itself is exciting, it's always moving, and instead of trying to slow things down and makes its flaws more apparent, it even overdoes things on purpose. Messy, sure, silly, sometimes, but overall more intriguing, funner, and more exciting. I cannot wait for the second season of this, since I thought the resolution to the story of the first season was excellent, as well as the final shot. 

P.S. Oh, I also want to add another note to take. The performances do hit their great marks, but the only truly incredible performance is Jessica Lange. Her character and performance makes all other supporting turns in television look stale by comparison, and all of her scenes are truly gold! She needs to win that Emmy next year! I want to see her back!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":288753,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-10-05","keywords":"anthology,male objectification,infidelity,supernatural,serial murder","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3078932/","name":"Lady Gaga","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000870/","name":"Kathy Bates","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000291/","name":"Angela Bassett"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060381/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314634/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0156994/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1004299/","name":"Brad Falchuk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Part 1: Red Tide - Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3243294745","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBmNjJmM2EtMTA4NC00YTg2LWJkY2UtZmRkZDc4YTdmMTA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBmNjJmM2EtMTA4NC00YTg2LWJkY2UtZmRkZDc4YTdmMTA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Your first taste. programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Le commandant Valérie Delbosse enquête seule sur un phénomène spatial troublant. Elle a rédigé un protocole de défense contre la menace ovni. De peur de ne pas être prise au sérieux, elle demande à Didier Mathure de le présenter aux plus aux sphères de l'état français. De leur côté, Véra et Rémy tente d'élucider le mystère du lac rempli de chaussures. Bernard annonce à Didier qu'Elise est la candidate du Cnes pour intégrer le pôle européen Ariane Espace.

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Après l'explosion du satellite du Cnes chargé d'examiner les marées, le professeur Mathure décide de faire une déclaration à la télévision. De son côté, Elise oriente sa candidature sur un nouveau projet. Au Cnes, la direction est en émoi et cherche à comprendre les raisons qui ont provoqué la chute du satellite dans l'atmosphère. Rémy met tout en ouevre pour effacer son intervention sur l'ordinateur principal.

Dieu est grand, je suis toute petite: Directed by Pascale Bailly. With Audrey Tautou, Edouard Baer, Julie Depardieu, Catherine Jacob. Michèle, 20 years old, feels terrible after having broken up with her boy-friend. She meets Francois, who's a veterinarian and jewish. Michèle decides to convert to Judaism because she has to believe in something, if not in someone." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0287986/","name":"Dieu est grand, je suis toute petite","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE2NzAxMDA4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTczNTQyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Michèle, 20 years old, feels terrible after having broken up with her boy-friend. Michèle decides to convert to Judaism because she has to believe in something, if not in someone.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0287986/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LeRoyMarko"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Light-hearted","reviewBody":"This movie will be easily forgotten. In fact, without Audrey Tautou, it would be pretty boring. Michèle (Tautou) falls for this guy, François (Baer), but also for his religion: Judaism. You see, Michèle is seeking herself in religion. She's been shopping around: Catholicism, Buddhism, etc. There is some tiny bit of thinking on what is it exactly to be a believer, but the movie doesn't go far enough.

But again, watch it for Tautou. She's got a certain spontaneity that is refreshing and that remind me of another Audrey [Hepburn].

Out of 100, I gave it 71. That's good for ** out of ****.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Nos programmes se terminent pour cette journée, en attendant ceux de demain.
programme.category: Fin

programme.title: Validé
programme.desc: Accompagné de ses amis d'enfance William et Brahim, Clément vit de trafics pour boucler ses fins de mois. Le jeune homme surnommé «Apash» caresse le rêve de percer dans le monde du rap. Un soir, il parvient à se faire inviter à l'émission spéciale consacrée à Mastar, une légende du rap français. L'artiste en herbe parvient à montrer son talent au micro de la radio au grand dam de la vedette qui voit en lui un sérieux rival.

credits.actor: Hatik
Saïdou Camara
Brahim Bouhlel

programme.category: Série dramatique

programme.title: Validé
programme.desc: L'intervention radio de Clément rencontre un véritable succès sur les réseaux sociaux et sur les sites de streaming. Mastar propose au jeune rappeur d'enregistrer un morceau sur son dernier album. De son côté, Mounir refuse de laisser partir son protégé. Clément se montre inquiet. Il veut arrêter les livraisons de drogue afin de ne pas compromettre ses chances de changer enfin d'existence. Il propose à William de devenir son manager.

credits.actor: Hatik
Saïdou Camara
Brahim Bouhlel

programme.category: Série dramatique

programme.title: Validé
programme.desc: Clément et son équipe sont parvenus à réaliser leur clip. Ils s'apprêtent à signer un contrat avec la maison de disques Omega. Mais le rappeur n'ose pas annoncer la nouvelle à son ancien producteur Mounir, qui règne en maître sur les trafics de drogue de sa cité. De son côté, Mastar décide de ne pas sortir le court-métrage musical où il doit apparaître en compagnie d'Apash. Quant à William, il craint de ne pas avoir les capacités requises pour tenir le rôle de manager.

credits.actor: Hatik
Saïdou Camara
Brahim Bouhlel

programme.category: Série dramatique

programme.title: Validé
programme.desc: Clément, alias Apash, a perçu une confortable avance de la part de la maison de disques Omega pour la sortie de son prochain album. Pour autant, il redoute la réaction de Mounir qui veut à tout prix diriger sa carrière. William décide d'avoir une explication avec lui. La discussion prend un tour dramatique. De son côté, Mastar met tout en oeuvre pour le déstabiliser lors des séances d'enregistrement en studio en compagnie de Sno.

credits.actor: Hatik
Saïdou Camara
Brahim Bouhlel

programme.category: Série dramatique

programme.title: Validé
programme.desc: Apash sort un album et un clip qui plaisent à sa maison de disques et à la critique. Sno a choisi de suivre le jeune homme. Le jour de la sortie officielle de ce premier opus dans les bacs, Mastar s'arrange également pour occuper le devant de la scène médiatique. Le rappeur organise une rixe dans une cité de la banlieue afin de faire le buzz et faire les gros titres de la presse spécialisée en même temps que son rival.

credits.actor: Hatik
Saïdou Camara
Brahim Bouhlel

programme.category: Série dramatique

programme.title: Validé
programme.desc: Clément a été humilié par Mastar en direct à la télévision. Le jeune artiste essuie les critiques et les moqueries sur les réseaux sociaux et Internet. Il tente de trouver un moyen pour inverser la tendance. William parvient à lui trouver une salle afin d'organiser un concert surprise. Une équipe de reporters décide de suivre le rappeur durant la journée précédant le show. Inès doute de la réussite du projet.

credits.actor: Hatik
Saïdou Camara
Brahim Bouhlel

programme.category: Série dramatique

programme.title: Validé
programme.desc: Après son concert improvisé, diffusé sur les réseaux sociaux, Apash est l'invité principal de l'émission de radio «Planète rap». Son opus, sorti depuis une quinzaine de jours, est déjà disque de platine. Depuis sa cellule de la prison de Fleury, Mastar ronge son frein. De son côté, Mounir réclame 300 000 € à la maison de disques pour céder les droits de l'album qu'il a conçu il y a quelques années avec Clément.

credits.actor: Hatik
Saïdou Camara
Brahim Bouhlel

programme.category: Série dramatique

programme.title: Validé
programme.desc: Après un showcase, Clément, William et Brahim se font voler la recette de la soirée. Les trois amis doivent trouver en deux semaines quelque 120 000 € pour financer leur tournée prévue à la rentrée. Clément craint pour la sécurité de sa mère et de sa soeur et envisage de demander de l'aide à Mounir. Mastar sort de prison. Il a engagé un jeune pour déstabiliser Apash qui prépare son deuxième album.

credits.actor: Hatik
Saïdou Camara
Brahim Bouhlel

programme.category: Série dramatique

programme.title: Validé
programme.desc: Apash apprend avec stupeur que l'un de ses premiers morceaux de jeunesse - très subversif - a fuité sur les réseaux sociaux. La polémique enfle et sa tournée est menacée. William demande des explications à Inès. La jeune femme lui annonce qu'elle vient de démissionner de la maison de disques. Pendant ce temps, Mounir s'apprête à aller chercher une cargaison de stupéfiants aux Pays-Bas.

credits.actor: Hatik
Saïdou Camara
Brahim Bouhlel

programme.category: Série dramatique

programme.title: Validé
programme.desc: Soprano invite Apash à participer à son concert organisé à Marseille et retransmis à la télévision. La prestation du jeune artiste est saluée par la presse et les nombreux téléspectateurs. Le patron de la maison de disques Omega sollicite William pour discuter d'un contrat pour sortir le second album de Clément. De son côté, Sergio entend venger le meurtre de Mounir. Il demande des explications à Clément.

credits.actor: Hatik
Saïdou Camara
Brahim Bouhlel

The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0388644/","name":"Soupçons","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU4NTE3MDY4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk4NjY1NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0388644/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"lallen08","dateCreated":"2010-06-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Biased and fascinating on many levels","reviewBody":"I knew nothing about the Peterson case before watching this film obsessively over a weekend. Even with Lestrade's clearly biased presentation, I came to the same conclusion the jury did - testament to the strength of the autopsy evidence. Res ipsa loquitur - she simply could not have died from a fall down the stairs given the lacerations and the blood. And nothing to suggest that an intruder caused her death. Sure, I winced when Freda Black went on and on about the porn, as if its existence on Peterson's computer in and of itself indicates anything. But all in all it was an interesting lesson into how the skilled storyteller can skew anything towards his chosen bias. And the score was absolutely exquisite.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20484,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary","Crime","Drama"],"keywords":"columnist,blowpoke,true crime,blood,staircase","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2023399/","name":"Michael Peterson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5308683/","name":"David Rudolf","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5509614/","name":"Ron Guerette"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070801/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Staircase - Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2745482009","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWJlZTMyYTktYjA0Mi00ODRiLThkMzQtMmNkM2JmNjI0OTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWJlZTMyYTktYjA0Mi00ODRiLThkMzQtMmNkM2JmNjI0OTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"The compelling story of Michael Peterson, a crime novelist accused of killing wife Kathleen after she is found dead at the bottom of a staircase in their home."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0388644, Title: Soupçons, --- Description: Soupçons: With Michael Peterson, David Rudolf, Ron Guerette, Martha Ratliff. The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0388644/","name":"Soupçons","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU4NTE3MDY4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk4NjY1NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0388644/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"lallen08","dateCreated":"2010-06-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Biased and fascinating on many levels","reviewBody":"I knew nothing about the Peterson case before watching this film obsessively over a weekend. Even with Lestrade's clearly biased presentation, I came to the same conclusion the jury did - testament to the strength of the autopsy evidence. Res ipsa loquitur - she simply could not have died from a fall down the stairs given the lacerations and the blood. And nothing to suggest that an intruder caused her death. Sure, I winced when Freda Black went on and on about the porn, as if its existence on Peterson's computer in and of itself indicates anything. But all in all it was an interesting lesson into how the skilled storyteller can skew anything towards his chosen bias. programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Après le succès international du film "Rencontres du troisième type", Didier Mathure et son équipe reçoivent la visite du cinéaste Steven Spielberg. Le metteur en scène américain est désireux de connaître les techniques d'investigation du Gepan en vue de préparer une suite à son film. Au même moment, trois adolescentes sont témoin d'un phénomène lumineux au-dessus du terrain de football où elles jouaient.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Didier et Véra ont découvert que les spectres observés par chaque témoin correspondent aux quatre planètes du système solaire observables depuis la Terre ; Mars, Mercure, Venus et Jupiter. L'ingénieur spatial comprend que le 24 juin, l'alignement de ces planètes correspond à une conjoncture astronomique qui se reproduit tous les 70 ans. De son côté, Marcel enquête sur le phénomène d'un crop circle.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Véra, Rémy et Marcel ont découvert le rapport peu élogieux sur le Gepan écrit par Didier Mathure. Pendant ce temps, le commandant Delbrosse a fait fuiter une des informations importantes des travaux du Gepan pour faire croire à une attaque extraterrestre imminente. De son Elise fait une découverte troublante au sujet de l'explosion de la fusée survenue à Kourou quatre ans plus tôt.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.desc:
The Pembrokeshire Murders: With Luke Evans, Keith Allen, Caroline Berry, Oliver Ryan. Detective superintendent reopens two unsolved murder cases from the 1980s. programme.title: Il bidone
Il bidone
programme.desc:
Il bidone: Directed by Federico Fellini. With Broderick Crawford, Giulietta Masina, Richard Basehart, Franco Fabrizi. A trio of con-men led by a lonesome swindler must deal with their job and family pressures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0047876/","name":"Il bidone","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWNiNmU3NGUtMmI0ZC00MDhhLTk3MGEtMjE5OTY1NDJmMzRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIzNDU1NTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A trio of con-men led by a lonesome swindler must deal with their job and family pressures.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0047876/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jotix100"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The swindlers","reviewBody":"Federico Fellini followed "La Strada" with this film. A forgotten classic that on second viewing still has the same impact when we saw it at a retrospective of the master's work some time back. Fellini was instrumental in creating this magnificent movie about con men that operated in Italy in the years that followed the end of WWII. Fellini worked on the screen play with his collaborators, Tullio Pinelli and Ennio Flaiano; they gave life to all these swindlers and made them human. Nino Rota's music and Otello Martinelli's cinematography compliment the film and make it even better.

Fellini was a director that got a lot from his actors, as he shows in "Il Bidone". Working with Broderick Crawford, and again with Richard Basehart, he was able to have both men give excellent performances, especially Mr. Crawford, who looks as though he is nothing but Italian because he convinces us he is the hard man he is portraying.

The three friends, Augusto, Picasso, and Roberto, go from one scheme to the next, never thinking about who are they stealing from. The best caper occurs at the beginning of the film as the trio arrives at the farm of the two older women with the promise of riches hidden in their land. Mr. Crawford's bishop is perfect. So is the assistant priest of Richard Basehart. Franco Fabrizi is the driver. The solution for getting the money away from the poor women is something not to be believed.

Augusto's life is an empty one. He goes from one job to another trying to outsmart his victims. It's not until Augusto meets his daughter Patrizia by chance, that he begins to feel what might be some remorse for his actions as he notices his beautiful daughter now grown and on her way to making something out of her life. His conscience begins to bother him because he realizes the evil of his ways.

The other best sequence in the film involves the party at Vargas' house where the swindlers have been invited to celebrate the arrival of the new year. We watch as Iris, Picasso's wife, realizes what her husband and the others are really up to. Roberto, the ladies' man, steals the gold cigarette case, not realizing that he is at the home of another con man and his actions will not go unnoticed, but even the embarrassment he goes through in front of the guests will make him give up his life.

"Il Bidone" is a fine example of the Italian cinema of those years as it shows an artist of the caliber of Federico Fellini in top form. The film will delight people that haven't been exposed to that part of Mr. Fellini's career seldom seen these days.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5661,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1955-10-07","keywords":"italy,con man,peasant,new year's eve,nightclub","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002024/","name":"Broderick Crawford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000865/","name":"Richard Basehart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0556399/","name":"Giulietta Masina"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000019/","name":"Federico Fellini"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032224/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005342/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000019/","name":"Federico Fellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0280919/","name":"Ennio Flaiano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684083/","name":"Tullio Pinelli"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Little Fugitive
Le petit fugitif
programme.desc: Little Fugitive: Directed by Ray Ashley, Morris Engel, Ruth Orkin. With Richard Brewster, Winifred Cushing, Jay Williams, Will Lee. A young boy fears that he shot his older brother, who is only faking. He then runs away to Coney Island, a crowded beach area, and gets money by returning soda bottles for their deposits." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0046004/","name":"Little Fugitive","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0OTU0NTIwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjY0NTEyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young boy fears that he shot his older brother, who is only faking. He then runs away to Coney Island, a crowded beach area, and gets money by returning soda bottles for their deposits.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0046004/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"imarciaj"},"dateCreated":"2000-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"remembrance","reviewBody":"As children growing up in Brooklyn in the 50's, this was my brother's and my very favorite Sat. afternoon movie. As an adult, reaching back for things of value to proffer to my children, I was delighted to find that this was still available, though bemused by the high critical acclaim and near cult status. I loved this movie because it spoke to me- I knew how the beach smelled after a rain, how much Joey longed to ride that pony, how the peculiar torture by an older brother could be forgiven and forgotten by a moment's offhand kindness (and a little guilt). Cinema verite notwithstanding, this was the truest movie of a real adventure I'd ever seen, and wonderful"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2657,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"1953-12-16","keywords":"national film registry,coney island,younger brother,older brother,harmonica","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Little Fugitive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1150484761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTI4YmExNWMtMmIwOC00YTQyLWIzYTYtZGYxNzMxZmE0Yzc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTI4YmExNWMtMmIwOC00YTQyLWIzYTYtZGYxNzMxZmE0Yzc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Kino Lorber, Inc."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108298/","name":"Richard Brewster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193705/","name":"Winifred Cushing"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0930864/","name":"Jay Williams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0039107/","name":"Ray Ashley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0257129/","name":"Morris Engel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0649907/","name":"Ruth Orkin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0115517/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0039107/","name":"Ray Ashley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0257129/","name":"Morris Engel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0649907/","name":"Ruth Orkin"}],"duration":"PT1H15M"}</script><metacontent="
