programme.title: Vivre sans eux
Vivre sans eux
programme.desc:
Vivre sans eux: Directed by Jacques Maillot. With Bernard Le Coq, Esther Garrel, Grégory Montel, Loïc Guingand. Martin is 60. Adèle is 25. He is unhealthy, grumpy and shy. She is cheeky, brazen and provocative. He is looking for his son, she is looking for her father. The two missing persons were living together as a couple, and when Martin an","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12106304/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rajdoctor"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"LIVING WITHOUT THEM","reviewBody":"Vivre Sans Eux

I saw this French drama VIVRE SANS EUX inspired from a True Story

A remorse father Martin (Bernand Le Coq) comes to meet his gay son at a mansion where he meets the new occupant Oliver (Gregory Montel). Martin becomes suspicious and spies on Oliver, leading him to meet Adele (Esther Garrel) who has come to meet her gay father - partner of Martin's son. Both start on an odd note but develop an endearing bond for the same purpose of finding their LOVED ones.

One thing leads to another, to reveal the suspense.

The script is very well written by Jean Luc Estebe with unusual plot twists and turns incorporated with relevant flashback stories of Martin and Adele.

Director Jacques Millot maintains a realistic look -unfolding complex human interactions and developing relationships between different characters while maintaining a countryside feel to the narrative.

The casting too is apt - Bernand as a remorseful father and Adele as a strong-willed, opinionated straight-talk daughter portray their characters with much ease. Gregory Montel's character is unlike what he has portrayed till date in his previous movies and he too does gritting justice to his role.

The good thing of the movie is that it does not fall into a typical cliche' sequence of events that we see in a psychological mystery-suspense thriller.

The movie had a good run in various European country telecast,

I would go with 6.75 out of 10 for this Italian production","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":88,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2020-04-08","keywords":"based on true story","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494204/","name":"Bernard Le Coq"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1081257/","name":"Esther Garrel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2771436/","name":"Grégory Montel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0537626/","name":"Jacques Maillot"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0125554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0210887/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0627173/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261548/","name":"Jean-Luc Estèbe"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: True Grit
True Grit
programme.desc: True Grit: Directed by Ethan Coen, Joel Coen. With Jeff Bridges, Hailee Steinfeld, Matt Damon, Josh Brolin. A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1403865/","name":"True Grit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODhkZDIzNjgtOTA5ZS00MmMzLWFkNjYtM2Y2MzFjN2FkNjAzL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1403865/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gobe-2"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"10/10 from a guy that does not like western movies","reviewBody":"To be honest I was never a big fan of western movies... Somehow I made myself to watch True Grit - had big doubts about it, but after all it was Coen brothers movie and it got only positive reviews all over internet. When the movie had finished I was completely stunned by how the story got me into it, how interesting and absorbing it was from the very first minutes!!! The characters were so genuine and extraordinary in the same time. I guess each of them could have their own individual movie, but here we had 3 of them crossing their paths of faith. Acting was just PERFECT - honestly I think this is Bridges best role, not to mention fantastic Damon and brilliant Steinfeld! In addition to that scenography and photography was excellent. Everything gave the viewer almost 2 hours of an amazing story, told in the best possible manner. Thank you brothers Coen for this masterpiece!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":321015,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Western"],"datePublished":"2011-02-23","keywords":"revisionist western,reference to new mexico,death by hanging,long drop hanging,spanking threat","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"True Grit: "Click" TV Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1984862489","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5NDM1NTAxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI1NTYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5NDM1NTAxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI1NTYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"True Grit: "Click" TV Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000313/","name":"Jeff Bridges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2794962/","name":"Hailee Steinfeld"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001053/","name":"Ethan Coen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001054/","name":"Joel Coen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093765/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001054/","name":"Joel Coen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001053/","name":"Ethan Coen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0692427/","name":"Charles Portis"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

Smith"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169264/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0008743/","name":"Jonathan Aibel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074184/","name":"Glenn Berger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0285379/","name":"Maya Forbes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4154703385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjRhZDM1NzYtM2U4Mi00NmNkLTk0MWMtNzliNTY5ZTEzOTgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjRhZDM1NzYtM2U4Mi00NmNkLTk0MWMtNzliNTY5ZTEzOTgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Poppy and Branch discover that they are but one of six different Troll tribes scattered over six different lands and devoted to six different kinds of music: Funk, Country, Techno, Classical, Pop and Rock. Their world is about to get a lot bigger and a whole lot louder."},"datePublished":"2020-04-10","description":"When the Queen of the Hard Rock Trolls tries to take over all the Troll kingdoms, Queen Poppy and her friends try different ways to save all the Trolls.","keywords":"jukebox musical,second part,troll doll,troll,based on toy","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6587640/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CrazyCockatoo2003"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"The most forgettable movie I have ever seen. .","reviewBody":"In my opinion, this sequel is very forgettable at best when in comparison with Trolls 1, which is slightly better than this movie. The problem with this movie is that they have used so many clichés that it's not even funny. In fact, they used nearly every common cliché you can think of. Furthermore, why is Branch depressed again, and where the hell did DJ Suki go? What I did like about it however, is the impressive animation and the fact that they are diverse to other cultures by having certain music genres from other countries such as Korea, Africa and Scotland. If you are a fan of Trolls, I would recommend it, otherwise it's best not to watch this movie as you might get bored. Personally, I am glad this sequel went straight to digital because of how forgettable it was.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18660,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

Their world is about to get a lot bigger and a whole lot louder.","datePublished":"2020-04-10","description":"When the Queen of the Hard Rock Trolls tries to take over all the Troll kingdoms, Queen Poppy and her friends try different ways to save all the Trolls.","keywords":"jukebox musical,second part,troll doll,troll,based on toy","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6587640/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"CrazyCockatoo2003","dateCreated":"2020-04-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"The most forgettable movie I have ever seen. .","reviewBody":"In my opinion, this sequel is very forgettable at best when in comparison with Trolls 1, which is slightly better than this movie. The problem with this movie is that they have used so many clichés that it's not even funny. In fact, they used nearly every common cliché you can think of. Furthermore, why is Branch depressed again, and where the hell did DJ Suki go? What I did like about it however, is the impressive animation and the fact that they are diverse to other cultures by having certain music genres from other countries such as Korea, Africa and Scotland. If you are a fan of Trolls, I would recommend it, otherwise it's best not to watch this movie as you might get bored. programme.title: Latte Igel und der magische Wasserstein
Le cristal magique
programme.desc:
Latte Igel und der magische Wasserstein: Directed by Mimi Maynard, Paulette Victor-Lifton, Regina Welker, Nina Wels. With Ashley Bornancin, Danny Fehsenfeld, Daniel Amerman, Timur Bartels. Follows the journey of a young hedgehog who wants to save the forest and its inhabitants from a horrible drought by reclaim a magical waterstone from the bear king." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9038290/","name":"Latte Igel und der magische Wasserstein","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2U3NTkxNjctMWEwMy00MmNiLTg0OTMtZTc3NzI1MGNmYWVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjYxNzY5MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the journey of a young hedgehog who wants to save the forest and its inhabitants from a horrible drought by reclaim a magical waterstone from the bear king.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9038290/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"e-43009"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not fun for the whole family..","reviewBody":"Latte and the Magic Waterstone was honestly kinda boring.

It had a plot that could've worked out, if it wasn't for the numerous gaps in its logic and explanation that personally ruined the movie. I think the uninspired, boring story writing was probably the worst aspect of the movie overall. The characters did their job, but they weren't really memorable or stuck to you well.

The only thing that the movie was able to knock out of the park, however, was definitely the graphics. Each scene was definitely fresh and vivid with colour, and the textures of the things in the world were really high quality. However, the animation part of the graphics weren't great and I definitely saw better, especially when it came to lip-syncing.

Overall, an honest middle-of-the-road movie experience. It's a great movie for kids, and has a few nice values and meanings, but for older kids and adults, the movie certainly felt unfinished and rushed to some extent.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":797,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-12-25","keywords":"forest","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi960151321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThlNTAwMjQtMTRjYS00MjhiLTk3ZmQtMTIyNDUxZTU0Y2NlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThlNTAwMjQtMTRjYS00MjhiLTk3ZmQtMTIyNDUxZTU0Y2NlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4272012/","name":"Ashley Bornancin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0270480/","name":"Danny Fehsenfeld"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3503149/","name":"Daniel Amerman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562775/","name":"Mimi Maynard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0896139/","name":"Paulette Victor-Lifton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3926624/","name":"Regina Welker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0731046/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0731047/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0393707/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2935195/","name":"Martin Behnke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4302662/","name":"Andrea Deppert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0554084/","name":"Marina Martins"}],"duration":"PT1H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tamara Drewe
Tamara Drewe
programme.desc:
Tamara Drewe: Directed by Stephen Frears. With Gemma Arterton, Roger Allam, Bill Camp, Dominic Cooper. A young newspaper writer returns to her hometown in the English countryside, where her childhood home is being prepped for sale." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1486190/","name":"Tamara Drewe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyOTIyMjI0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzcyODE3Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young newspaper writer returns to her hometown in the English countryside, where her childhood home is being prepped for sale.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1486190/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"winterhaze13"},"dateCreated":"2010-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"An Under-appreciated Gem","reviewBody":"Tamara Drewe is a real gem by The Queen director Stephen Frears. It is an updated version of Thomas Hardy's Far from the Madding Crowd but based on a graphic novel by Posy Simmonds. A dark comedy set in the English countryside, the story is centred on a writer's colony run by Tamsin Greig's character Beth and her crime writer husband Nicholas, played by Roger Allam.

Gemma Arteton plays the title character who lived in the same small down in Dorset known as Ewedown during her teenage years. Now grown up she returns to restore and hopefully sell the house she used to live in. With help from a surgically reconstructed nose, Tamara Drewe has blossomed into a beautiful woman and her presence shakes the sleepy town as Bethsheba did in Hardy's novel.

The film is true to the memory of Thomas Hardy maintaining the turmoil of sexual desire and even obsession across all age groups which so commonly adorned his novels. One of the characters, the sympathetic American novelist Glen played by Bill Camp is writing a novel influenced by Hardy and references the author on many occasions.

The film breaks the notion of a quiet and sleepy town, like so many British films do. Underneath these seemingly close communities lies an underlining suspicion. Everyone is in everyone else's business in Ewedown and Tamara's presence only helps fuel the tension.

The pivotal scene that embodies Tamara Drewe's character occurs when Glen tells her that life must be very easy for her because she is beautiful. She laughs it off citing that it has always been difficult for her to be taken seriously.

Behind the character of Tamara Drewe lies something more sinister. The sudden appearance of a beautiful face in the town leads to a series of events that causes the balance of everyone's life to be upset. Men are suddenly smitten by the prospect of sex while women are often jealous or angry by the disruption they cause.

The story really begins to escalate when Tamara begins to date a drummer in a rock band played by Dominic Cooper and sets up permanently in the town. Soon, everyone in the town is invested in the lives of these people in some way.

The voyeurism of the locals who regard Tamara Drewe as both someone to envy and detest is likened to the celebrity status of her rock star boyfriend. Tamara quickly becomes the target of two schoolgirls who are both obsessed with the drummer and jealous of Tamara for disturbing the order of things.

The film eases its dark themes with its excellent use of subtle humour. The updated version of one of Hardy's most celebrated novels exposes the reality of a voyeuristic society too concerned with the lives of other people.

Along with Frears excellent direction, the other great strength of this film is its actors with special distinction going to Tamsin Greig. Greig is familiar to the London stage scene while others have played minor roles in big films. Gemma Arteton was one of Bond's muses in the Quantum of Solace. Roger Allam has been equally excellent in Frears academy award winning film the Queen as well as in V for Vendetta.

On one final note, I read one review that argued that the climax just does not amount to much which I personally felt was very misguided. The ending was true to the traditions of Hardy which is what Tamara Drewe is all about.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21314,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-09-10","keywords":"scantily clad female,lust,hot pants,underwear,bare butt","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tamara Drewe","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2479556121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2NzcxOTc5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjk2Njg3Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2NzcxOTc5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjk2Njg3Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young newspaper writer returns to her hometown in the English countryside, where her childhood home is being prepped for sale."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2605345/","name":"Gemma Arterton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1812656/","name":"Luke Evans"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002641/","name":"Dominic Cooper"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001241/","name":"Stephen Frears"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104115/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315381/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799654/","name":"Posy Simmonds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1620490/","name":"Moira Buffini"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

It is an updated version of Thomas Hardy's Far from the Madding Crowd but based on a graphic novel by Posy Simmonds. A dark comedy set in the English countryside, the story is centred on a writer's colony run by Tamsin Greig's character Beth and her crime writer husband Nicholas, played by Roger Allam.

Gemma Arteton plays the title character who lived in the same small down in Dorset known as Ewedown during her teenage years. Now grown up she returns to restore and hopefully sell the house she used to live in. With help from a surgically reconstructed nose, Tamara Drewe has blossomed into a beautiful woman and her presence shakes the sleepy town as Bethsheba did in Hardy's novel.

The film is true to the memory of Thomas Hardy maintaining the turmoil of sexual desire and even obsession across all age groups which so commonly adorned his novels. One of the characters, the sympathetic American novelist Glen played by Bill Camp is writing a novel influenced by Hardy and references the author on many occasions.

The film breaks the notion of a quiet and sleepy town, like so many British films do. Underneath these seemingly close communities lies an underlining suspicion. Everyone is in everyone else's business in Ewedown and Tamara's presence only helps fuel the tension.

The pivotal scene that embodies Tamara Drewe's character occurs when Glen tells her that life must be very easy for her because she is beautiful. She laughs it off citing that it has always been difficult for her to be taken seriously.

Behind the character of Tamara Drewe lies something more sinister. The sudden appearance of a beautiful face in the town leads to a series of events that causes the balance of everyone's life to be upset. Men are suddenly smitten by the prospect of sex while women are often jealous or angry by the disruption they cause.

The story really begins to escalate when Tamara begins to date a drummer in a rock band played by Dominic Cooper and sets up permanently in the town. Soon, everyone in the town is invested in the lives of these people in some way.

The voyeurism of the locals who regard Tamara Drewe as both someone to envy and detest is likened to the celebrity status of her rock star boyfriend. Tamara quickly becomes the target of two schoolgirls who are both obsessed with the drummer and jealous of Tamara for disturbing the order of things.

The film eases its dark themes with its excellent use of subtle humour. The updated version of one of Hardy's most celebrated novels exposes the reality of a voyeuristic society too concerned with the lives of other people.

Along with Frears excellent direction, the other great strength of this film is its actors with special distinction going to Tamsin Greig. Greig is familiar to the London stage scene while others have played minor roles in big films. Gemma Arteton was one of Bond's muses in the Quantum of Solace. Roger Allam has been equally excellent in Frears academy award winning film the Queen as well as in V for Vendetta.

On one final note, I read one review that argued that the climax just does not amount to much which I personally felt was very misguided. The ending was true to the traditions of Hardy which is what Tamara Drewe is all about.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21314,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-09-10","keywords":"scantily clad female,lust,hot pants,underwear,bare butt","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tamara Drewe","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2479556121","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2NzcxOTc5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjk2Njg3Mw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2NzcxOTc5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjk2Njg3Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young newspaper writer returns to her hometown in the English countryside, where her childhood home is being prepped for sale.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2605345/","name":"Gemma Arterton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1812656/","name":"Luke Evans","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002641/","name":"Dominic Cooper"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001241/","name":"Stephen Frears"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104115/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315381/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799654/","name":"Posy Simmonds","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1620490/","name":"Moira Buffini"],"duration":"PT1H47M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 12 Years a Slave
12 Years a Slave
programme.desc:
12 Years a Slave: Directed by Steve McQueen. With Chiwetel Ejiofor, Dwight Henry, Dickie Gravois, Bryan Batt. In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2024544/","name":"12 Years a Slave","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExMTEzODkyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTU4NTc4OQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252230/","name":"Chiwetel Ejiofor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0931324/","name":"Michael Kenneth Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1055413/","name":"Michael Fassbender"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2588606/","name":"Steve McQueen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0120121/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136967/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0725983/","name":"John Ridley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1185849/","name":"Solomon Northup"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi302032921","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MjI1OTI2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMwODQ3MDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MjI1OTI2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMwODQ3MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery."},"datePublished":"2013-11-08","description":"In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.","keywords":"slavery,separation from family,torture,kidnapping,racism","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2024544/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dvc5159"},"dateCreated":"2013-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Roll Jordan Roll","reviewBody":"A random and encounter has led Solomon Northup from living freely in New York to being kidnapped and sold into slavery in Louisiana, getting handed over to various slave owners. There, Solomon witnesses numerous acts of cruelty that no man should ever face.

As I stared at the movie screen with full dread, I was reeling back at certain scenes I had just witnessed. There were good films and television shows about slavery before, and they had various nuances at how to tackle slavery. This film is part of said resurgence of the sub- genre, hot on the heels of "Django Unchained" and "The Butler". But while the former relinquishes on Spaghetti Western entertainment more than attempting to address the issue in a political light as the latter, Steve McQueen's "12 Years a Slave" shuts those two up, and perhaps the entire sub-genre, for good. I doubt any future slavery-themed film will be as harrowing as this one was.

Steve McQueen is a fearless filmmaker, continuing his streak of unfiltered brutality within human depths. He frames his actors' faces in extreme close-up, the eyes staring into despair, the nostrils fuming in aggression. Naked flesh are shown not because of erotic content, but rather because of desperation and futility. Long takes and wide shots are not uncommon in his films, and here they showcase a plethora of fantastic scenes and performances that work to discomfort the viewer as much as possible. McQueen doesn't just allow the audience to tackle slavery, he guts the audience and leaves them for the consequences. This is an extremely uncomfortable film to watch. Beautifully shot locations are placeholders for unsettling sequences before and after, contemplated by Hans Zimmer's poignant and at times horrifying score. This all works to create a nightmarish time and place where hell walks on Earth.

Central to all of this is the performance of Chiwetel Ejiofor as Solomon. Ejiofor showcases that he is a natural force to be reckoned with in this film, after a decade of mostly supporting characters. He spaces out in despair as the camera lingers onto him for solid minutes, not a word spoken. Another sequence shows him mourning the death of a fellow worker, in which the singing of the surrounding group compels him and shakes him down to tears. These scenes follow earlier ones where he is a classy, free man in the upper states, mingling happily with the crowd and partaking in fanciful music sessions. It is a tour-de-force performance.

A fine ensemble of established and up-and-coming actors surround Ejiofor in his limelight - Paul Dano, Paul Giammati, Alfre Woodard, Sarah Paulson, even Brad Pitt and Benedict Cumberbatch, but none so ferociously as McQueen regular Michael Fassbender as the despicable, sadistic plantation owner Edwin Epps. So excellent and terrifying is Fassbender's portrayal of such a merciless and barbaric person, that the mere sight of him will either cause audience members unfamiliar to him to flinch.

I was left speechless as the credits rolled. A lesser film would have added tacked-on sentimentality/exaggeration and politically influenced claptrap. Not this one. This is a movie to watch as a reminder of how powerful the human spirit can endeavor, and how lucky all of us have grown past that dreadful time in history. The full effect of it has not been felt in movies before, until now.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":655561,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"duration":"PT2H14M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Altamira
Altamira
programme.desc: Altamira: Directed by Hugh Hudson. With Antonio Banderas, Clément Sibony, Rupert Everett, Javivi. Life and events of the man who realized one of the most important discoveries of the 19th century: Altamira's caves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3014910/","name":"Altamira","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyMjEzNjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ0ODA2OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life and events of the man who realized one of the most important discoveries of the 19th century: Altamira's caves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3014910/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alanpgini"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"History and science meet a too drawn out dramatic narrative","reviewBody":"I gave this a seven, because of the historical importance of the Altamira cave paintings. But as film itself goes, it rates a 6. History saves this film. The depiction of the work of the paleolithic art is accurate, though somewhat blurred in its depiction. The background of this film was too drawn out however, to allow for a better rating. It steers to closely to a Hallmark movie, rather than a dramatic historic narrative. To me, when actual historic dialog is lacking, as little as possible should be added to fill in the blanks. I almost stopped watching it due to the tedium of the dialogue. The acting was good. It was probably Banderas's best work since the 13th warrior. He was very believable in the role of Marcelino Sanz de Sautuola. Though his accent still detracts from his performance, even in a Spanish role. Rupert Everett shows once again his great talent. It is sad that his attitude has led to the downfall of his career. The other character actors were somewhat bland but acceptable. As it is the case with any historical film, that teaches as well as entertains, the audience and mankind can only benefit. programme.review: --- Actors: Antonio Banderas (role=Marcelino), Clément Sibony (role=Émile Cartailhac), Rupert Everett (role=Monseñor), Javivi (role=Harlé), Irene Escolar (role=María adulta), Pierre Niney (role=Paul Ratier), Nicholas Farrell (role=Vilanova), Allegra Allen (role=Young María Sautuola), Lluís Soler (role=Mero), Tábata Cerezo (role=Pasi), Golshifteh Farahani (role=Conchita), Chantal Garsan (role=Soprano)

IMDb data; ttnr: 3014910, Title: Altamira, --- Description: Altamira: Directed by Hugh Hudson. With Antonio Banderas, Clément Sibony, Rupert Everett, Javivi. Life and events of the man who realized one of the most important discoveries of the 19th century: Altamira's caves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3014910/","name":"Altamira","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyMjEzNjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ0ODA2OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life and events of the man who realized one of the most important discoveries of the 19th century: Altamira's caves.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3014910/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alanpgini","dateCreated":"2016-12-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"History and science meet a too drawn out dramatic narrative","reviewBody":"I gave this a seven, because of the historical importance of the Altamira cave paintings. But as film itself goes, it rates a 6. History saves this film. The depiction of the work of the paleolithic art is accurate, though somewhat blurred in its depiction. The background of this film was too drawn out however, to allow for a better rating. It steers to closely to a Hallmark movie, rather than a dramatic historic narrative. To me, when actual historic dialog is lacking, as little as possible should be added to fill in the blanks. I almost stopped watching it due to the tedium of the dialogue. The acting was good. It was probably Banderas's best work since the 13th warrior. He was very believable in the role of Marcelino Sanz de Sautuola. Though his accent still detracts from his performance, even in a Spanish role. Rupert Everett shows once again his great talent. It is sad that his attitude has led to the downfall of his career. The other character actors were somewhat bland but acceptable. As it is the case with any historical film, that teaches as well as entertains, the audience and mankind can only benefit. A must watch for amateur historians.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2663,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2016-04-01","keywords":"cave,discovery,father daughter relationship,19th century,spain","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Finding Altamira","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi760264473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyOGYzM2ItMzEwNC00Nzg1LThiYTItZjI2ZjhlYWYxZTU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyOGYzM2ItMzEwNC00Nzg1LThiYTItZjI2ZjhlYWYxZTU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Finding Altamira","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796316/","name":"Clément Sibony","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000391/","name":"Rupert Everett"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0399853/","name":"Hugh Hudson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0585110/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0523978/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0663878/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0381757/","name":"Olivia Hetreed","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006856/","name":"José Luis López-Linares"],"duration":"PT1H37M"</script><metacontent="

Les enquêtes du département V : Miséricorde
programme.desc: Kvinden i buret: Directed by Mikkel Nørgaard. With Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Per Scheel Krüger, Troels Lyby, Øyvind B. Fabricius Holm. Police inspector Carl Mørck is put in charge of a department of cold cases, joined only by his assistant, Assad. They dig into a case about a disappeared woman." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2438644/","name":"Kvinden i buret","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQyNTE0MDQ1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTYxMTkwMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Police inspector Carl Mørck is put in charge of a department of cold cases, joined only by his assistant, Assad. They dig into a case about a disappeared woman.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2438644/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Fella_shibby"},"dateCreated":"2017-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gripping n decent Scandinavian noir.","reviewBody":"I saw this on a rented DVD in 2014. Felt like writing a review before i watch two of its sequels. The plot - After a raid gone wrong that resulted in the death of one of his team and the paralysis of another, a homicide cop Nikolaj Lie Kaas has been kicked to the basement aka Department Q to tie off five years of unresolved cases along with an inexperienced assistant called Faras Faras. They wind up pursuing the case of a high-ranking female politician, a supposed suicide whose body was never found. In short this is Scandinavian Noir. The acting of the two leading detectives is assured and the cinematography is compelling. It is a perfectly adequate crime thriller that will appeal to fans of this genre. The Keeper of Lost Causes is genuinely gripping, even though the direction is fairly standard and the main plot elements are predictable. Fans of The Treatment, Marshland, Memories of murder, Headhunters, Insomnia, True Detectives - S1 will definitely enjoy this.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":28006,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2013-10-03","keywords":"missing person,copenhagen denmark,hyperbaric chamber,walking in on sex,woman on top","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2239736857","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjA0Mjc4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQxNDE1MjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjA0Mjc4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQxNDE1MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Chief detective Carl MÃ¸rck and his assistant Assad become involved in a five-year-old case concerning the mystery of politician Merete Lynggaard's disappearance - a journey that takes them deep into the undercurrent of abuse and malice that lurks beneath the polished surface of Scandinavia.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509263/","name":"Nikolaj Lie Kaas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1272258/","name":"Per Scheel Krüger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527937/","name":"Troels Lyby"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1031708/","name":"Mikkel Nørgaard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0437063/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001935/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0437070/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647695/","name":"Jussi Adler-Olsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1064048/","name":"Nikolaj Arcel"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1652216, Title: DCI Banks, --- Description: DCI Banks: With Stephen Tompkinson, Jack Deam, Andrea Lowe, Caroline Catz. The tenacious and stubborn DCI Banks unravels disturbing murder mysteries aided by his young assistants, DS Annie Cabbot and DI Helen Morton." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1652216/","name":"DCI Banks","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNkZDJlMTQtYTlmNC00NTBlLWJkMzUtNTlkODY5OWJhZTFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The tenacious and stubborn DCI Banks unravels disturbing murder mysteries aided by his young assistants, DS Annie Cabbot and DI Helen Morton.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1652216/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"BeneCumb","dateCreated":"2016-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another solid and realistic crime series from UK","reviewBody":"The Brits have always known how to create a realistic depiction of daily activities of a police district, without constant shootings and chases, with officers rather "ordinary and boring" than driving luxury cars and wearing fashion clothing... Although there are dozens of frosts-morses-lewises out there, there is always room for more - and DCI Banks is another good result, pleasant to follow also then when the course of criminal activities or solution is not totally to your liking. 

Alan Banks is certainly the very leading character, but he is not a lonely wolf, but a team players (with some reservations), depending on his colleagues' judgments and opinions - thus different from Frost or the Swedish Wallander, for example. I have not read any of Peter Robinson's novels, but I find Stephen Tompkinson a talented performer here - particularly bearing in mind that he has had more comedy roles to play... The female detectives, however, tend to remain somewhat sketchy, despite having different looks, approaches and background.

Anyway, a good series recommended to all fond of similar creations, without too much oppressiveness and violence. You might want to watch the episodes in sequence and without episode splitting, otherwise some nuances and events related to the characters' private life may remain misty.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6519,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-27","keywords":"police detective,murder mystery,british police,police procedural,yorkshire","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0867017/","name":"Stephen Tompkinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0212675/","name":"Jack Deam","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0522882/","name":"Andrea Lowe"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015194/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dci Banks","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi661765401","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkxY2NhYmUtMDhiYy00MDM1LWFhZWEtYTg3MzUzNmNjZDhhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkxY2NhYmUtMDhiYy00MDM1LWFhZWEtYTg3MzUzNmNjZDhhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dci Banks"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alabuszewski003","dateCreated":"2005-01-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best Show EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!","reviewBody":"Oh my God, where do I start. This show is so amazingly awesome. I loved it after the first episode. The plot is so thick and rich. The character development is immense. It's like watching a one hour movie. Hell, it's better than most movies. The twist and turns and the ironies make you cry for more when the show is over. And I don't know, but I love the style of everything in the show. Brenda's apartment and the decorating, the whole show has this west coast down to earth natural but not stinky hippie contemporary modern ambiance. It's just a great show and it is pleasing to the eye in the process. I'm sad to hear there is just one more episode. But I will def. buy the DVD's even though I've seen all the shows!!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":126084,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alabuszewski003","dateCreated":"2005-01-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best Show EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!","reviewBody":"Oh my God, where do I start. This show is so amazingly awesome. I loved it after the first episode. The plot is so thick and rich. The character development is immense. It's like watching a one hour movie. Hell, it's better than most movies. The twist and turns and the ironies make you cry for more when the show is over. And I don't know, but I love the style of everything in the show. Brenda's apartment and the decorating, the whole show has this west coast down to earth natural but not stinky hippie contemporary modern ambiance. It's just a great show and it is pleasing to the eye in the process. I'm sad to hear there is just one more episode. But I will def. buy the DVD's even though I've seen all the shows!!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":126084,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. programme.title: Madam Secretary
Madam Secretary

credits.actor: Tea Leoni, Tim Daly, Keith Carradine, Patina Miller, Geoffrey Arend

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 3501074, Title: Madam Secretary, --- Description: Madam Secretary: Created by Barbara Hall. With Téa Leoni, Tim Daly, Erich Bergen, Zeljko Ivanek. A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3501074/","name":"Madam Secretary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWJiMTNiNDktZGM1ZS00NmU3LWFiNmQtNjc0ZjNlMTU5ZjAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3501074/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kodenkan","dateCreated":"2015-03-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Give it a chance","reviewBody":"This is a great new show that highlights Tea's and Tim's acting chops. I'm glad to see casting chose the talented versus gorgeous actor route and graced them with intelligent crisp dialogue. I'm a guy and it's nice to see a middle aged woman get a leading role.

The geopolitics and inner politics are a bit reminiscent of "West Wing" although the ensemble doesn't have the synergy of WW's first two seasons, and the cast doesn't play off each other quite as well.

Unfortunately, most of the reviews I've read thus far reveal that the public sees this show as an unpaid ad vehicle to Secty Clinton - I disagree - so tragically, it may not last long.

I agree with a previous reviewer who asserted that the eldest daughter is obnoxious. She's probably written true to life: she'd likely be spoiled and entitled having grown up upper middle class in today's society with her privileges. And she'd probably be saddled with sophomoritis since she's a 20 year old articulate woman who's a freshman dropout.

I also have to marvel at the negotiating/conflict resolution skill of the writers as voiced by the parents. Several times I've had to stop the program and sit at the TV in amazement at how deftly these parents dealt with a child's misbehaving or explanations of tragedies. And Tea's character displays the same art in her political maneuvering. Wow! I wish I could diffuse arguments that artfully. Or had been graced with parents who had an iota of their skill.

Bottom line: this show deserves to be renewed.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20959,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-09-21","keywords":"politician,secretary of state,chief of staff,political conflict,politics","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004857/","name":"Tim Daly","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2706992/","name":"Erich Bergen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0111281/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075256/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355329/","name":"Barbara Hall"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madam Secretary: Series Premiere","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153522201","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer"</script><metacontent="

I'm glad to see casting chose the talented versus gorgeous actor route and graced them with intelligent crisp dialogue. I'm a guy and it's nice to see a middle aged woman get a leading role.

The geopolitics and inner politics are a bit reminiscent of "West Wing" although the ensemble doesn't have the synergy of WW's first two seasons, and the cast doesn't play off each other quite as well.

Unfortunately, most of the reviews I've read thus far reveal that the public sees this show as an unpaid ad vehicle to Secty Clinton - I disagree - so tragically, it may not last long.

A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alabuszewski003","dateCreated":"2005-01-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best Show EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!","reviewBody":"Oh my God, where do I start. This show is so amazingly awesome. I loved it after the first episode. The plot is so thick and rich. The character development is immense. It's like watching a one hour movie. Hell, it's better than most movies. The twist and turns and the ironies make you cry for more when the show is over. And I don't know, but I love the style of everything in the show. Brenda's apartment and the decorating, the whole show has this west coast down to earth natural but not stinky hippie contemporary modern ambiance. It's just a great show and it is pleasing to the eye in the process. I'm sad to hear there is just one more episode. But I will def. buy the DVD's even though I've seen all the shows!!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":126084,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3501074/","name":"Madam Secretary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWJiMTNiNDktZGM1ZS00NmU3LWFiNmQtNjc0ZjNlMTU5ZjAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004857/","name":"Tim Daly","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2706992/","name":"Erich Bergen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0111281/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075256/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355329/","name":"Barbara Hall"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madam Secretary: Series Premiere","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153522201","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer","datePublished":"2014-09-21","description":"A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family.","keywords":"politician,secretary of state,chief of staff,political conflict,politics","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3501074/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Kaliani","dateCreated":"2014-09-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Will wait and see","reviewBody":"Being from Europe and not really interested in the details of US politics, I watched the show simply as entertainment and did not take it too seriously. Too bad some people take it as propaganda, it's only a TV show...

I liked the pilot and it left a lot of room for character and storyline development. 

Seeing as there are far worst shows out there, I'm willing to give this one a chance and hope to be positively surprised. 

Also, I've been waiting for Téa Leoni to be back on TV and really enjoyed watching her in a role that is perfect for her.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20470,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 3501074, Title: Madam Secretary, --- Description: Madam Secretary: Created by Barbara Hall. With Téa Leoni, Tim Daly, Erich Bergen, Zeljko Ivanek. A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3501074/","name":"Madam Secretary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWJiMTNiNDktZGM1ZS00NmU3LWFiNmQtNjc0ZjNlMTU5ZjAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3501074/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kodenkan","dateCreated":"2015-03-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Give it a chance","reviewBody":"This is a great new show that highlights Tea's and Tim's acting chops. I'm glad to see casting chose the talented versus gorgeous actor route and graced them with intelligent crisp dialogue. I'm a guy and it's nice to see a middle aged woman get a leading role.

The geopolitics and inner politics are a bit reminiscent of "West Wing" although the ensemble doesn't have the synergy of WW's first two seasons, and the cast doesn't play off each other quite as well.

Unfortunately, most of the reviews I've read thus far reveal that the public sees this show as an unpaid ad vehicle to Secty Clinton - I disagree - so tragically, it may not last long.

I agree with a previous reviewer who asserted that the eldest daughter is obnoxious. She's probably written true to life: she'd likely be spoiled and entitled having grown up upper middle class in today's society with her privileges. And she'd probably be saddled with sophomoritis since she's a 20 year old articulate woman who's a freshman dropout.

I also have to marvel at the negotiating/conflict resolution skill of the writers as voiced by the parents. Several times I've had to stop the program and sit at the TV in amazement at how deftly these parents dealt with a child's misbehaving or explanations of tragedies. And Tea's character displays the same art in her political maneuvering. Wow! I wish I could diffuse arguments that artfully. Or had been graced with parents who had an iota of their skill.

Bottom line: this show deserves to be renewed.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20959,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-09-21","keywords":"politician,secretary of state,chief of staff,political conflict,politics","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004857/","name":"Tim Daly","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2706992/","name":"Erich Bergen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0111281/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075256/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355329/","name":"Barbara Hall"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madam Secretary: Series Premiere","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153522201","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer"</script><metacontent="

The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2049116/","name":"Gomorra: La serie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzNmNjZGQtMjM3ZC00Y2Y2LTlkZGItM2EwNTM2MmUyMDExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxNjUyMDkx._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5086277/","name":"Salvatore Esposito"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3634704/","name":"Marco D'Amore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3822030/","name":"Cristiana Dell'Anna"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036389/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073684/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169165/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006938/","name":"Leonardo Fasoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1836999/","name":"Stefano Bises"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2500207/","name":"Roberto Saviano"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 4 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3721707545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjYjUyNjgtODM2YS00NjE3LTg5MGEtMzY4MGJmNmE0ZDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjYjUyNjgtODM2YS00NjE3LTg5MGEtMzY4MGJmNmE0ZDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Downtown Naples is much like love. Once you have fallen in, there is no escaping it. Season 4 of the Italian mafia drama, "Gomorrah," premieres May 20, 2021 on HBO Max."},"datePublished":"2014-05-06","description":"Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.","keywords":"treason,shifting power,dialect,sicilian mafia,camorra","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2049116/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"genuinemucker"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best series on TV by a LONG way","reviewBody":"On flicking through the TV one night I stumbled onto this at Episode 8 (I learned later). I'm not a big fan of subtitled series, but I found the lead role's mohawk haircut interesting enough to keep me tuned in for longer than usual. The rest is history. Once you start watching Gennnaro Savastano (played by Salvatore Esposito) you will be addicted. The macho man of all macho men, he looks like he could burst you with one right hook. As if one magnetic actor wasn't enough, along comes Salvatore Conte (played by Marco Palvetti), a suave slickster with an instantly addictive accent and way of expressing himself. The action is constantly moving at perfect pace, the settings are beautifully contrasted. Everything about this series is brilliant, even the bit-part players are magnetic, one such character brilliantly named Tonino Spiderman. This is a must-own series for all gangster movie/TV series buffs, and the great thing about it is, not a lot of people know just how mind-blowingly brilliant it is.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32094,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wrong Turn
Wrong Turn
programme.desc:
Wrong Turn: Directed by Rob Schmidt. With Desmond Harrington, Eliza Dushku, Emmanuelle Chriqui, Jeremy Sisto. Chris and a group of five friends are left stranded deep in the middle of the woods after their cars collide. As they venture deeper into the woods, they face an uncertain and bloodcurdling fate." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295700/","name":"Wrong Turn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQwMTkyMTY4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDc0NDE3._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0244630/","name":"Eliza Dushku"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004825/","name":"Emmanuelle Chriqui"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003343/","name":"Rob Schmidt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029749/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0568416/","name":"Alan B. McElroy"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Wrong Turn","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1946026265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY3YjZjODQtMzNkZC00ZTZjLTg2NTMtN2UyN2NiNTk1ZTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY3YjZjODQtMzNkZC00ZTZjLTg2NTMtN2UyN2NiNTk1ZTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "Coming Soon""},"datePublished":"2004-04-07","description":"Chris and a group of five friends are left stranded deep in the middle of the woods after their cars collide. As they venture deeper into the woods, they face an uncertain and bloodcurdling fate.","keywords":"west virginia,bound and gagged,voyeur,voyeurism,flat tire","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0295700/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TJ1380"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A scary movie that actually scared me.","reviewBody":"I usually don't find horror movies to be very scary. I've seen enough of them to know pretty much what's going to happen and when it will happen. They're generally so predictable that they just fail to illicit any kind of emotional response in me whatsoever. "Wrong Turn" is an exception, however. It's one of the rare horror movies that was actually as scary and disturbing to me as it was meant to be.

The plot, which involves six attractive young people being hunted by a family of cannibalistic mountain men, is very straightforward and offers no real surprises to fans of horror movies. As is the case in most of these movies, however, the plot quickly becomes besides the point, and the movie becomes more concerned with trying to frighten and disturb the viewer.

Needless to say, it succeeds. The mountain men prove to be some of the scariest movie killers that I've seen in a long time, probably because the film wastes no time in showing us exactly what they plan to do with their victims (we see this about a half-hour into the movie in a scene that is guaranteed to make at least half of the people who watch it really, really sick). They also manage to be more relentless and even more beyond reason than most horror movie killers; they behave more like wild animals than people.

The acting is considerably better than most movies in this genre. Granted, that's not saying much, but I actually felt more than a little sympathy for the two main characters (Eliza Dushku and the Ray Liotta-looking med student). They behave just like anyone else would in that situation, and they're likable enough and believable enough to make us root for them. I didn't find myself feeling much sympathy for the rest of the cast (they often act like typical slasher movie fodder, especially the two kids who get high and have sex shortly before being murdered), but they're at least more believable than the characters who usually appear in these movies.

Overall, I would have to say that this movie was better than most of the horror movies that have come out lately. I wouldn't recommend it to everyone, but any fan of horror movies should definitely check it out."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112314,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"duration":"PT1H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Octagon
Octagon – Die Rache der Ninja
programme.desc:
The Octagon: Directed by Eric Karson. With Chuck Norris, Karen Carlson, Lee Van Cleef, Art Hindle. A martial artist must defeat a plan by ninjas to create a worldwide training camp for terrorists." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0081259/","name":"The Octagon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUyNTY1NzEtOTdjNi00OGRmLTgxYWItMjY1Yzg4NDgxZWUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Romance"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001569/","name":"Chuck Norris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0137948/","name":"Karen Carlson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001812/","name":"Lee Van Cleef"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440171/","name":"Eric Karson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043754/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0152443/","name":"Leigh Chapman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007477/","name":"Paul Aaron"}],"datePublished":"1980-08-15","description":"A martial artist must defeat a plan by ninjas to create a worldwide training camp for terrorists.","keywords":"ninja,younger version of character,aerial camera shot,man dresses as a woman,man murders a woman","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0081259/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HarryLags"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"In a world of choices, there is no choice Chuck Norris must face THE OCTAGON.","reviewBody":"The Octagon's premise is simple. Chuck Norris vs Ninjas. That's really about it. Norris is Scott James, a man haunted by memories of his growing up and rivalry with his former martial art brother Seikura, who now heads a Ninja training camp and is teaching international terrorists the ways of the Ninja. James must stop the organization and face off, once and for all, with his former brother.

There's little in the way of story, and sadly the film takes it's time in getting to the point where Norris finally takes out the Ninja trash. Like a lot of his movies, the lack of much plot means the film moves pretty slowly between the action. When the action does kick in, it's quite impressive. The real standout though is Norris infiltrating the Ninja base in the film's climax. It's classic Norris.

The cast are okay. Lee Van Cleef and Richard Norton pop up in small roles, Richard Norton actually has a few different roles here.

I would have rated it an 8 out of 10 if there was a bit more action in the middle half of the film. For the most part, only Chuck Norris and ninja fans will get the most out of THE OCTAGON (1980).

Overall worth watching..7 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5160,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

Chuck Norris vs Ninjas. That's really about it. Norris is Scott James, a man haunted by memories of his growing up and rivalry with his former martial art brother Seikura, who now heads a Ninja training camp and is teaching international terrorists the ways of the Ninja. James must stop the organization and face off, once and for all, with his former brother.

There's little in the way of story, and sadly the film takes it's time in getting to the point where Norris finally takes out the Ninja trash. programme.title: Xin Su shi jian
Stadt der Gewalt
programme.desc:
Xin Su shi jian: Directed by Tung-Shing Yee. With Jackie Chan, Naoto Takenaka, Daniel Wu, Jinglei Xu. A simple Chinese immigrant wages a perilous war against one of the most powerful criminal organizations on the planet." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1075419/","name":"Xin Su shi jian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2MTk5NzA2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU2MDQxMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A simple Chinese immigrant wages a perilous war against one of the most powerful criminal organizations on the planet.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1075419/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dvdxml"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Story, Good Acting","reviewBody":"Yes, Jackie Chan can do serious drama acting.

In fact, if you're a fan or you're familiar with his pass work, such as 1985 "Heart of Dragon", he's drama acting is quite good.

Westerners who only know Jackie by "Rush Hour" might find this film distasteful as it doesn't fit their stereotypical expectation of a funny/silly ass kicking Jackie Chan.

This movie puts on stage the tragic human drama of Chinese illegal immigrants in japan. The film payed a lot of attention in the details, and its backed up by so many good/great actors from mainland China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and japan.

The director strikes a PERFECT balance in handling the sensitive relationship between Chinese and Japanese.

There isn't much special effects in this movie. It all comes down to the realistic acting and intriguing storyline and ends with a befitting conclusion.

It's very unfortunate this movie hasn't received the publicity it deserves especially in the west. If you're observant, you might notice that even "IMDb.com" is downplaying the influence of great Asian movies such as this one by giving it a Cantonese title "San Suk Si Gin (2009)" instead of "Shinjiku Incident" in an attempt to withhold it from English speaking audience.

Everyone from mainland China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and most of all japan, SHOULD WATCH THIS MOVIE.

Ironically, if you're westerner who likes Jackie Chan because of Rush hour, YOU DEFINITELY WON'T LIKE THIS DRAMA!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12152,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-04-02","keywords":"gratitude,chinese,gang,japan,immigrant","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shinjuku Incident","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2775648025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE4NmMzZDMtZTgxZC00NzQxLTkxOGMtN2YyYjNkY2MwN2Q2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE4NmMzZDMtZTgxZC00NzQxLTkxOGMtN2YyYjNkY2MwN2Q2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this Jackie Chan movie"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000329/","name":"Jackie Chan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0847562/","name":"Naoto Takenaka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0943079/","name":"Daniel Wu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0232504/","name":"Tung-Shing Yee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0572618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0232504/","name":"Tung-Shing Yee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161159/","name":"Tin Nam Chun"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Xin shao lin si
Shaolin
programme.desc:
Xin shao lin si: Directed by Benny Chan. With Shaoqun Yu, Chen Zhiui, Xing Yu, Jing Wu. After ambushing and killing his rival, losing everything in the process, dispirited warlord Hou Jie turns to a Shaolin monastery seeking salvation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1533749/","name":"Xin shao lin si","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDc3MWUwNjgtMjg1My00NzljLWFmMDMtNGRhNzJmNzk4MDllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQwMjk0NjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After ambushing and killing his rival, losing everything in the process, dispirited warlord Hou Jie turns to a Shaolin monastery seeking salvation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1533749/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ashil-john-"},"dateCreated":"2011-09-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mustn't be missed for the low 6.8 rating...!!..","reviewBody":"I almost skipped this flick when I saw the low 6.8 rating on IMDb. And to be honest, that would've been really unfortunate! Remember the kind of movies that leave something behind in your hearts long after they've finished running? Well, this is most certainly one of those. The background score and soundtrack will linger in your head, I guarantee you that. But most importantly, just when you THINK you've figured it all out and stamped it 'just another Kung Fu flick'; all ready to be discarded and disregarded, wait for the kicker...!

A simple yet significant moral, getting to know the Buddhist way, beautiful locations, and commendable direction to top it off; This movie truly had the potential to be an epic. Almost...!

I thought I'd go with an 8 at first...but finally decided on a full 10; forgiving its small flaws to make way for the bigger message this movie delivers..!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19003,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama"],"datePublished":"2011-01-27","keywords":"china,shaolin,1920s,warlord,shaolin master","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1389272089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjA5NzQwMDAyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTMyMzYxNg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjA5NzQwMDAyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTMyMzYxNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The monks of the Shaolin Temple take in a young warlord whose family was wiped out in an act of betrayal. As he embraces the monk's lifestyle and practices, he and his protectors must face off against the ruthless General Hou. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3195061/","name":"Shaoqun Yu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5507552/","name":"Chen Zhiui"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1789084/","name":"Xing Yu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0150802/","name":"Benny Chan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0233538/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049799/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099734/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0950701/","name":"Alan Yuen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2031176/","name":"Chi Kwong Cheung"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4567251/","name":"Quiyu Wang"}],"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Acts of Violence
Acts of Violence
programme.desc: Acts of Violence: Directed by Brett Donowho. With Bruce Willis, Cole Hauser, Shawn Ashmore, Ashton Holmes. At a bachelorette party in a nightclub, the bride tells 2 guys offering blow to go away. They abduct her.
